entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is being tortured NOW! shouted Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry shouted 'Sirius is being tortured NOW!'

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: But if this is a trick of V-Voldemort's — Harry, we've got to check,

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: We'll have to use Umbridge's fire and see if we can contact him,

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: said Hermione, who looked positively terrified at the thought.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny said immediately, 'Yeah, we'll do it,'

entities.name: luna
entities.description: said Luna, who looked mildly surprised.

entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: Harry said aggressively to Hermione, 'Okay, if you can think of a way of doing this quickly, I'm with you, otherwise I'm going to the Department of Mysteries right now —'

entities.name: stubby boardman
entities.description: When you say 'Sirius,' are you talking about Stubby Boardman?

relationships.description: Harry shouted 'Sirius is being tortured NOW!'
But if this is a trick of V-Voldemort's — Harry, we've got to check,
We'll have to use Umbridge's fire and see if we can contact him,
Harry said aggressively to Hermione, 'Okay, if you can think of a way of doing this quickly, I'm with you, otherwise I'm going to the Department of Mysteries right now —'
The Department of Mysteries? But how are you going to get there?
